msg: Adding OneWay annotation described in the SCA spec to allow app developers to annotate non-blocking methods business methods

author: felipeal
msg: Replaced Sun's jars (javamail and jaf) for Geronimo's equivalent

author: dain
msg: Added created timestamp to configuration which should help with hot deploy.
Added concept of owned configurations.  An owned configuration is cascade-uninstalled when the owner is uninstalled.
Added config.info file to cars which contains an easy to parse data needed for efficient management such as time stamp, module type and owned configurations.
